name: Dyson Vortex Bladeless Fan
description: Bladeless fan with air multiplier technology for smooth and powerful airflow. Includes a remote control for convenient operation.

name: Honeywell QuietSet Tower Fan
description: Tower fan with 8-speed settings, oscillation feature, and quiet cooling for enhanced comfort. Suitable for home or office use.

name: Lasko Wind Curve Tower Fan
description: Tower fan with 3-speed settings, a fresh air ionizer, and remote control for efficient and convenient air circulation.

name: Vornado 660 Whole Room Air Circulator
description: Air circulator with Vortex technology, multi-directional airflow, and whisper-quiet operation for whole-room comfort.

name: Rowenta Turbo Silence Stand Fan
description: Stand fan with 4-speed settings, silent mode, and adjustable height for personalized and quiet cooling performance.
